page.title: 20Community Links,Great Ayton.
page.content: {YATTON HOUSE}is situated on {Guisbrough Road}and is a centre for handicapped people.Blind,deaf, physically and mentally handicapped people attend the centre.The present Manager of{Yatton House}is{Mr.D.Kent. He and his voluntary helpers teach basket-work and gardening which they all enjoy. {Yatton House}is trying to help the handicapped live as normal life as possible in{Great {Ayton. { AYTON NEIGHBOURS}is an exercise in voluntary service whose main task is to act as an information channel, putting people in need, in touch with others who can help.The Group can arrange to: { {Go on minor errands(such as shopping.) {Read the newspaper to you(if needed.) {Call in and have a friendly chat. {Visit you in hospital if you are ill.
